title: High-purity monomer recovery from commercial engineering plastics by vacuum pyrolysis depolymerization
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00614C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Eri Yoshida
High-purity monomers recovered from engineering plastics by vacuum pyrolysis can serve as substitutes for their virgin monomers to reproduce the original polymers, forming an economic closed-loop system of the chemical recycling.
